channel.title: News Report on G. Alexander Heard, chancellor of Vanderbilt University
channel.description:
A report on Vanderbilt chancellor Alexander Heard, who was extended an invitation to fill the newly created post of adviser to President Nixon on campus affairs on issues of concern to students—including the Vietnam War and the military expansion into Cambodia. This program provides an overview of the chancellor’s meetings with the administration.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

image.title: News Report on G. Alexander Heard, chancellor of Vanderbilt University
